attributes.action: Instruct bus operating companies to stop using their headlights during daylight  and to switch off their engines when the driver is having a break
attributes.additional_details:
If busses switched their headlights off during daylight hours just calculate how much less fuel they would consume.
Secondly,   when a bus is stationary at a depot  or bus terminal for ten or fifteen minutes, or the driver is on a break, make it compulsory for the engine to be switched off.
These measures could save a significant  amount of fuel   and also  cut down on exhaust fumes.
